articleContent:
Dear Rovers:


Wuthering Waves "Closed Beta II" is due to be terminated at 18:00 on 17th March 2024 (UTC+8). The server will be shut down, and you will no longer be able to log in to the game as of then. All game data will be discarded after the termination of Closed Beta II. 


Thank you for your continued attention and support! To learn more about Wuthering Waves, please visit our official website or follow us on social media.


Wuthering Waves Dev Team
articleTitle: Reminder: End of Closed Beta II
